planet.name: HD 219134 b
BD+56 2966 b
GJ 892 b
HIP 114622 b
HR 8832 b
2MASS J23131692+5710059 b
PPM 41599 b
TYC 4006-1866-1 b
planet.description: HD 219134 with its four low-mass planets is the first result of the Rocky Planet Search program with HARPS-N on the Telescopio Nazionale Galileo in La Palma. Spitzer observations allowed the discoverers to detect the transit of one planet in front of the star making HD 219134 b the nearest known transiting planet to date.
